author: Home Repair Tutor
description: PEX A shower valve adapter tips…I apply MegaTape and pipe thread sealant to the valve. Then I use SharkBite adapters for all the ports except for the one on the right side of the diverter valve. Adding the adapters allows me to use PEX A for all the water supply lines, which makes this installation fast and easy. Many thanks to SharkBite for sponsoring this tutorial 🔥#plumbing #bathroomremodel #sharkbiteplumbing #homerepairtutor #brandpartner
title: PEX A Shower Valve Adapter Tips   - #shorts #plumbing #homerepairtutor #brandpartner
